Class Cone

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShapeBaseClass
      • ThreeDimensionalShapes
        • Cone

  • public class Cone
extends ThreeDimensionalShapes
    This Cone class creates an object with the characteristics of a cone shape. It can calculate the surface area and the volume of the cone. It inherits the ThreeDimensional Class

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double surfaceArea
      surfaceArea is an instance variable of type double that stores the surface area of the cone
      private double volume
      volume is an instance variable of type double that stores the volume of the cone

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Cone(java.lang.String name)
      The constructor for cone class that accepts a String argument.
      Cone(java.lang.String name, double radius, double height)
      This constructor has 3 parameters.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      This calculateSurfaceArea is a static method that calculates the surface area given a certain radius and height

      This calculateVolume is a static method that calculates the volume of the cone given a certain radius and height

      The getSurface area is an accessor method for the surfaceArea instance variable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cone

        public Cone(java.lang.String name)
        The constructor for cone class that accepts a String argument. The argument will be the name of the cone. This constuctor call the ThreeDimensionalShapes constructor
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the cone

      • Cone

        public Cone(java.lang.String name,
            double radius,
            double height)
        This constructor has 3 parameters. The first is the name of the class, second if the radius of the cone and third is the height of the cone. This constructor calls the super constructor and pass the radius for its dimX and dimY and pass the height for its dimZ
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the cone
        radius - the radius of the cone
        height - the height of the cone

    • Method Detail

        The getSurface area is an accessor method for the surfaceArea instance variable. It return the surface area of type double
        Returns:
        the surface area of type double

      • getVolume

        public double getVolume()
        An accessor method for the volume instance variable. It returns the volume of the cone of type double
        Returns:
        the volume of type double

        public static double calculateSurfaceArea(double radius,
